2.title: Graduated from the Faculty of Management, Belarusian State Economic University

3.title: He started working on Belarusian television. He was the lead and director of the program «Filmed!»

4.title: In collaboration with Oleg Lukashevich, he implements the art project «Heritage of Belarus»

5.title: Defended a thesis of a candidate of economic sciences

6.title: Became the Laureate of the Prize of the President of the Republic of Belarus «For Spiritual Revival»

8.title: He became deputy head of the National Pavilion of the Republic of Belarus at the Cannes Film Festival

9.title: He began working in the Belarusian documentary as a director

10.title: He graduated from the Belarusian State Academy of Arts with a degree in director

3.title: London. Exhibition as part of the «Discover Belarus» campaign

snippet.shortDescription: Belarusian photographer, publisher, designer, journalist, director, candidate of economic sciences.

0.title: Museum of Modern Art. Opening of the project with a series of photo exhibitions: «Temples of Belarus», «Manors and Town Halls of Belarus», «Palaces and Castles of Belarus»

2.title: UNESCO Headquarters in Paris. Exhibition «The Legacy of Belarus» in honor of the 50th anniversary of the entry of the Republic of Belarus into UNESCO

3.title: National Academy of St. Cecilia in Rome, exhibition in the framework of the Days of Culture of the Republic of Belarus

6.title: Pushkin House in London, an exhibition as part of the «Discover Belarus» campaign

9.title: At the art fence of the Chelyuskintsev open-air park in Minsk. Photo exhibition consisting of 60 photos

11.title: Book-album «National Historical Museum of the Republic of Belarus»

13.title: The art project «The Legacy of Belarus» presented in Brussels, Berlin, Minsk, Prague and Vienna

14.title: Art project «The Legacy of Belarus» presented in Budapest
